about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, Dynamic Services & Security Limited offers manpower solution services in the field of Mechanized cleaning, catering, housekeeping, security, logistics, contractual services, and other services

It provides Guarding/Custoridal services, integrated facility management, and digitalization services. The company offers a comprehensive range of customized services in both the public and private segments to meet customers' requirements.

Competitive strengths

  • A comprehensive range of manpower solution services.
  • Established track record of 13 years of experience.
  • Strong quality products with ISO certification.
  • Proven business model and smooth operation flow.
  • Well-defined organizational structure.

faqs.question: What is the Dynamic Services & Security IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dynamic Services & Security IPO is a SME IPO of 4732000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.13 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 30, 2021, and closes on October 5, 2021.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dynamic Services & Security IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dynamic Services & Security IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dynamic Services & Security IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dynamic Services & Security IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dynamic Services & Security IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Dynamic Services & Security IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Dynamic Services & Security IPO opens on September 30, 2021 and closes on October 5, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Dynamic Services & Security IPO?
faqs.answer: Dynamic Services & Security IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dynamic Services & Security IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dynamic Services & Security IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Dynamic Services & Security IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Dynamic Services & Security IPO will be done on Friday, October 8, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 12, 2021. Check the Dynamic Services & Security IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Dynamic Services & Security IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Dynamic Services & Security IPO listing date is on Wednesday, October 13, 2021.
